author: cbs8
title: Want 7 Wonderful Ways to "Wine Down" for CA Wine Month? Discover Special Wine, Adventure and Lodging Packages in Morro Bay, CA -
text:
Morro Bay, CA
Take Advantage of Discounted Wine Tastings and Adventures with the Morro Bay Adventure Pass offering a Variety of Experiences from Discounted Kayak Rentals (Wine Picnic on the Sand Spit Anyone?), to Riverboat Brunch Cruises on the Bay
MORRO BAY, Calif. , Aug. 27, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- This September say cheers to California Wine Month and enjoy one of the Central Coasts premier agricultural products while you "Wine Down " on the coast in Morro Bay, CA. Located on Highway 1 along California's Central Coast, midway between Los Angeles and San Francisco , Morro Bay offers visitors a wide variety of wine experiences from Chablis Riverboat Cruises on the bay and quaint wine tastings at local wine bars, to savoring local Morro Bay oysters paired with local wine or kayaking out to a special location for a picnic with your favorite vino.
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150826/261274
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150826/261275LOGO
"We have such a fantastic wine culture here," says Brent Haugen , Executive Director of the Morro Bay Tourism Bureau. "When most people think of Morro Bay , they conjure up sunny beaches, surfers and nearby rolling vineyards. During California wine month, we highlight the marriage between our coastal culture and our state's award-winning wines while our visitors reap the benefits!"
The Morro Bay Adventure Pass program will wind you up and wine you down with access to some of the best outdoor excursions and delicious Morro Bay wine adventures at one low cost! "Wine down" on the Riverboat Chablis during a relaxing brunch with Chablis Cruises . Kayak to the sand spit and "wine down" with a picnic lunch on the bay with Kayak Horizons and A Kayak Shack Dine on local Morro Bay oysters and "wine down" at STAX Wine Bar & Bistro . Enjoy live music, fine wine and a good time at Morro Bay Wine Seller . Savor Chateau Margene Tasting Room 's wine and olive oil on the Pacific Coast Wine Trail. Take advantage of perfect lodging pairings this September for CA Wine Month. For more information and details on ways to "wine down" in Morro Bay , please visit http://www.morrobay.org/wp-content/uploads/Morro-Bay_-wine-month-081015.pdf . For travel information visit http://www.morrobay.org or follow Morro Bay on its Facebook , twitter or Pinterest pages.
